mapper.insert: insert into V_HIS_LAB_INFO (TEST_NO, PATIENT_ID, PATIENT_NAME, VISIT_NO, INHOSPITAL_NO, OUTPATIENT_NO, ID_NO, CARD_NO, PHONE_NUMBER, LAB_SOURCE, LAB_DATE_TIME, ITEM_NAME, SPECIMEN_TYPE, SPECIMEN, REQUEST_NO, DOCTOR_CODE, DOCTOR_NAME, INS_DEPT_CODE, INS_DEPT_NAME, LAB_DATE, REQUESTED_DATE_TIME, PERFORMED_BY, RESULT_STATUS, LAB_CREATE_TIME, TOTAL_EXPENSE, RECEIVABLE_EXPENSE, ACTUAL_EXPENSE, BILLING_INDICATOR, PRESC_NO) values (#{testNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patientName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inhospitalNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outpatientNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{specimenType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{specimen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doctorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doctorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insDeptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insDeptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{requestedDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{performedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resultStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labCreateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalExpense,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{receivableExpense,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{actualExpense,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{billingIndicator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{prescNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update V_HIS_LAB_INFO set PATIENT_ID = #{patientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PATIENT_NAME = #{patientName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VISIT_NO = #{visitNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INHOSPITAL_NO = #{inhospitalNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OUTPATIENT_NO = #{outpatientNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ID_NO = #{idNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CARD_NO = #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE_NUMBER = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAB_SOURCE = #{labSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAB_DATE_TIME = #{labDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ITEM_NAME = #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPECIMEN_TYPE = #{specimenType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPECIMEN = #{specimen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQUEST_NO = #{requestNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DOCTOR_CODE = #{doctorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DOCTOR_NAME = #{doctorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INS_DEPT_CODE = #{insDeptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INS_DEPT_NAME = #{insDeptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAB_DATE = #{labDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REQUESTED_DATE_TIME = #{requestedDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PERFORMED_BY = #{performedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESULT_STATUS = #{resultStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAB_CREATE_TIME = #{labCreateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOTAL_EXPENSE = #{totalExpense,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RECEIVABLE_EXPENSE = #{receivableExpense,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ACTUAL_EXPENSE = #{actualExpense,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BILLING_INDICATOR = #{billingIndicator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PRESC_NO = #{prescNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where TEST_NO = #{testNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select TEST_NO, PATIENT_ID, PATIENT_NAME, VISIT_NO, INHOSPITAL_NO, OUTPATIENT_NO, ID_NO, CARD_NO, PHONE_NUMBER, LAB_SOURCE, LAB_DATE_TIME, ITEM_NAME, SPECIMEN_TYPE, SPECIMEN, REQUEST_NO, DOCTOR_CODE, DOCTOR_NAME, INS_DEPT_CODE, INS_DEPT_NAME, LAB_DATE, REQUESTED_DATE_TIME, PERFORMED_BY, RESULT_STATUS, LAB_CREATE_TIME, TOTAL_EXPENSE, RECEIVABLE_EXPENSE, ACTUAL_EXPENSE, BILLING_INDICATOR, PRESC_NO from V_HIS_LAB_INFO where TEST_NO = #{testNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
